titles.title: Bouken ni, Tsuitekonaide Okaasan!: Chouka Hogo na Saikyou Dragon ni Sodaterareta Musuko, Hahaoya Douhan de Boukensha ni Naru
Please Do Not Come for Adventure!: The Boy Who was Raised by the Ultimate Overprotective Dragon
Becomes an Adventurer with His Mother
冒険に、ついてこないでお母さん！ 〜 超過保護な最強ドラゴンに育てられた息子、母親同伴で冒険者になる
I Can Go Adventuring by Myself, Mom!: The Son Raised by the Strongest Overprotective Dragon-Mom

title: Bouken ni, Tsuitekonaide Okaasan!: Chouka Hogo na Saikyou Dragon ni Sodaterareta Musuko, Hahaoya Douhan de Boukensha ni Naru
title_english: I Can Go Adventuring by Myself, Mom!: The Son Raised by the Strongest Overprotective Dragon-Mom
title_japanese: 冒険に、ついてこないでお母さん！ 〜 超過保護な最強ドラゴンに育てられた息子、母親同伴で冒険者になる
title_synonyms: Please Do Not Come for Adventure!: The Boy Who was Raised by the Ultimate Overprotective Dragon
Becomes an Adventurer with His Mother
synopsis:
What would you do if you had a drop-dead gorgeous Mom? Not only that... but one that's extremely overprotective, extremely kind, and gets lonely extremely easily? And to top it all off, she's also "The Strongest Demonic Dragon Who Has Even Eaten a God?!" The curtain boldly opens on the ultimate and extraordinary "mother-son" fantasy of Ryuuji, the young man who dreams of being an adventurer, and his overprotective mother, the demonic dragon Karma Abyss!!

(Source: Square Enix)
background: Bouken ni, Tsuitekonaide Okaasan!: Chouka Hogo na Saikyou Dragon ni Sodaterareta Musuko, Hahaoya Douhan de Boukensha ni Naru has been published digitally in English as I Can Go Adventuring by Myself, Mom!: The Son Raised by the Strongest Overprotective Dragon-Mom by Square Enix through Manga UP! and through Comikey since October 21, 2023.
